page.title: 08Harpenden Sports' Centre
page.content:
Harpenden Sports' Centre is in Rothamsted Park. It has outdoor facilities for football, tennis, golf, putting and swimming. In the sports' hall you can play every indoor game, there are also squash courts and an additional room for other activities such as yoga, keep fit and archery.
The centre is open daily from 8.30am- 11.30pm. Courses are run by trained staff for housewives, children and adults and courts may be hired at any time. At weekends and during school holidays activity courses are arranged for children. At least 500 children use the centre each week.
A survey of our school showed that 46 children used the centre weekly, 138 used it occasionally and 139 children visit it during the school holidays.
